name: Lone-Wolf
description:
Lone Wolf is a third person action, endless survival runner.

You are a wolf, and you have to outrun the avalanche that is expanding.

Throughout the gameplay there are obstacles such as trees, animals and debris to impede your escape.

The game was fully made using Unity's built in Visual Scripting (Bolt).

Beware of Loud music / sound at the beginning.

Do not play it fullscreen, UI gets messed.

Movement:

W A S D for movement.

You can press Escape to end your run faster.

This is a student prototype and a submission to the Low Code Game Jam (GNOJ#7)

If the game plays poorly on the browser, downloading it could bring better results.

Minimum Specs: (as a joke ofc, since it tends to run poorly on the browser)

CPU: i9-12900k

RAM: 32gb RAM

GPU: 3070 ti
